entry.title: $2300 // >>>1/2 MO. FEE 2 BED/FLEX 3-SPACIOUS -HOME OFFICE - RENOVATED - SS AP
entry.content:
>>> NO FEE!! 2 BED/FLEX 3 - SPACIOUS - HOME OFFICE - RENOVATED - SS APPLIANCES - PARKING!!!<<<

Listing ID #: 169419
Price: $2,800
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.5
Bathrooms: 1.0

Apartment Amenities

Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
NO FEE

This apartment is truly massive. A first floor walk in with two private entrances, a home office/flex 3 bed with tons of natural light. The windows are almost floor to ceiling, one section has concave window sill for sitting and throughout the apartment there are 10 foot ceilings. The floors are all hard wood creamy colored and brand new. The kitchen has brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and exhaust fan. The bathroom is porcelain tiled and overall the apartment is brand new. There is also parking available for a small fee.

Close to 30th ave full of restaurants, cafes, lounges, nightlife and Steinway St, Gyms, salon, shopping, markets and more! Only 5 minutes walk to the N/W 30th Ave train station, Midtown Manhattan is just 15 minutes away!

This is a NO HALF MONTH FEE apartment
 

Panagiotis Skevas

Phone: 718-685-2775
